Title: Sofia for Now
Writer: Claudia Duran (story), Claudia Duran, Jonathan Martofel (story)
Actors: Jessamyn Ansary, William Bailey, Carla Betancourt, Tonya Broach
Plot: A young Latina girl named Sofia who goes on a journey to find her mother. In the end, she finds more than she could ever imagine: friends, fears, herself, and a place to call home...for now.
